pull.title: tests: Avoid read/write to default datadir
pull.body: tests should never read or write and potentially corrupt the default datadir, so try to avoid it.

events.message: bench_bitcoin: Avoid read/write to default datadir

events.body: Added a commit to `.travis.yml` that fails when applied to current master
Reverted to my initial solution, since the functional tests are still broken. Can be fixed in a future pull...
@MarcoFalke makes sense to fix everything here no?
I have no idea how to fix the broken functional test cross platform without removing it.

Note the failing test: https://travis-ci.org/bitcoin/bitcoin/jobs/404617285#L3068

```
 File "/home/travis/build/bitcoin/bitcoin/build/bitcoin-i686-pc-linux-gnu/test/functional/feature_config_args.py", line 39, in run_test
    self.nodes[0].assert_start_raises_init_error(['-conf=' + conf_file], 'Error reading configuration file: specified data directory "' + new_data_dir + '" does not exist.')

Strange - I thought we already checked this in travis.

Anyhow thanks for fixing this again. utACK fa43a4138b4a652bd83d70536539ae2aded05f0c

issue.title: commits from bitcoin/master
issue.body:
Change gitian-descriptors to use bionic instead
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13171

Trivial: fix references to share/rpcuser (now share/rpcauth)
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13664

rpc: Fix that CWallet::AbandonTransaction would leave the grandchildren, etc. active
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13652

Net: Bucketing INV delays (1 bucket) for incoming connections to hide tx time
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13298

Initialize m_next_send_inv_to_incoming
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13679

Add depends 32-bit arm support for bitcoin-qt
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13604

tests: Avoid read/write to default datadir
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13663

bench: Remove unused variable
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13682

Add scantxoutset RPC method
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/12196

Scripts and tools: Fix BIND_NOW check in security-check.py
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13647

[doc] Remove outdated comment about miner ignoring CPFP
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13680

tests: Use MAX_SCRIPT_ELEMENT_SIZE from script.py
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13638

Migrate gitian-build.sh to python
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13623

[moveonly] Extract MakeUnique into utilmemory.h
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13690

contrib: Clone core repo in gitian-build
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13692

contrib: correct version check
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13699

Modified in_addr6 cast in CConman class to work with msvc
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13672

travis: Check that ~/.bitcoin is never created
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13687

doc: Add release notes for -printtoconsole and -debuglogfile changes
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13625

bitcoinconsensus: invalid flags error should be set to bitcoinconsensus_err
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13655

BIP 174 PSBT Serializations and RPCs
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13557

[wallet] Decouple wallet version from client version
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13500

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -53,6 +53,7 @@ install:
     - travis_retry DOCKER_EXEC apt-get update
     - travis_retry DOCKER_EXEC apt-get install --no-install-recommends --no-upgrade -qq $PACKAGES $DOCKER_PACKAGES
 before_script:
+    - DOCKER_EXEC [ ! -d \$HOME/.bitcoin ]  # Make sure default datadir does not exist
comments.body: WDYT about creating a dummy file? It would cause failure if used right?

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -53,6 +53,7 @@ install:
     - travis_retry DOCKER_EXEC apt-get update
     - travis_retry DOCKER_EXEC apt-get install --no-install-recommends --no-upgrade -qq $PACKAGES $DOCKER_PACKAGES
 before_script:
+    - DOCKER_EXEC [ ! -d \$HOME/.bitcoin ]  # Make sure default datadir does not exist
comments.body:
Indeed. That would then give a nice bt in case of failure. Thanks

```yaml
    - DOCKER_EXEC echo \> \$HOME/.bitcoin  # Make sure default datadir does not exist and is never read by creating a dummy file
